lunge.name: Lunge
lunge.description: Lunge at your opponent for extra damage.

spin.name: Spin
spin.description: Spin around your opponent, switching positions.

feint.name: Feint
feint.description: Attack that does no damage but charges your AP.

push.name: Push
push.description: Knock back your opponent with your next attack.

reprise.name: Reprise
reprise.description: Gain balance on your next attack.

insistence.name: Insistence
insistence.description: Charge up your endurance on your next attack, but do no damage.

sweep.name: Sweep
sweep.description: Knock back enemies with your brawn.

berserk.name: Berserk
berserk.description: Your lust for blood heals you.

parry.name: Parry
parry.description: Block an incoming attack with your weapon.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Avoid the next incoming attack with your agility.

endure.name: Endure
endure.description: Absorb damage from the next attack that damages you.

retreat.name: Retreat
retreat.description: Avoid the next attack by moving backwards away from your opponent.

shove.name: CounterShove
shove.description: When attacked, shove your opponent back.

rage.name: Rage
rage.description: Getting hit makes you mad! You gain AP when damaged.

swift.name: Swift
swift.description: Go first on the next turn.
